General.Name: Paragon Globe Bhd
General.Description: Paragon Globe Berhad, an investment holding company, invests, develops, and trades in properties in Malaysia and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Investments, Property Development, and Construction. It is also involved in the construction of buildings, roads, and railways, as well as other specialized construction activities. The company was formerly known as Goh Ban Huat Berhad and changed its name to Paragon Globe Berhad in 2018. The company was incorporated in 1948 and is headquartered in Johor Bahru, Malaysia. Paragon Globe Berhad is a subsidiary of Paragon Adventure Sdn Bhd.
